website_summaries.verdict: A convenient mix of instant printing capabilities and digital tech. Great for printing fun souvenirs with the option to download photos and print externally.
pros: LCD display can serve as viewfinder or for photo editing
Stores 13 megapixel photos on SD card for transfer to computer
Integrates with iPhone or Android over Bluetooth for printing
cons: Uses ZINK photo paper, which is cheaper than film but still expensive
Prints are only 2 inches by 3 inches with fair (but not outstanding) quality

customer_reviews.title: Quality pictures keeping the retro look
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures whilst keeping the retroness of a polaroid camera. Doesnt work very well in high temperatures
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Coombes

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking camera
customer_reviews.text: Only tried once on my self but easy to use going to make use of it on holiday My first pic was a bit dull maybe a light issue But great smart toy when printing pic and they pop out Had a laugh Never had a camera but this was more my level of initiate
customer_reviews.author: cfires

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the picture is not very good, i thought as you can safe it being digital maybe the quality is better when saved but it is still pretty bad. I was looking for an instant camera for our wedding, i might go for just a printer
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera
customer_reviews.text: Good looking camera with lots of fun features. We had to do a few trial runs to make it work colour wise and the response time when clicking on the button is quite slow. It probably needs some practice but overall happy with it ! Picture quality is good !
customer_reviews.author: erwin bos

customer_reviews.title: great camera but came with no instructions so had to ...
customer_reviews.text: great camera but came with no instructions so had to look them up this might be a problem for someone without the internet
customer_reviews.author: Alice pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth perchance
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to take pictures with and get them in the right place as always out of line and not worth it. I'm very very disappointed with this. It's not the seller's fault it's the manufacturer Polaroid
customer_reviews.author: Tina Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but it's pricey getting the paper all the time
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this item he loves it . Good camera but itsgoing to be quite pricey getting pictures printed all time
customer_reviews.author: Matthew northey

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera for groups and parties
customer_reviews.text: Super fun instant camera, the photos are clear and excellent to share. Good build, though would have liked that the on/off mechanism wasn't so sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro R

customer_reviews.title: Good fun camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera if you want instant photos for fun.I purchased a micro card so I can transfer them to my computer. The photos are even better then. I had to go on the Polaroid web site to down the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Picture not of excellent quality, colour photographs I think come out better than black and white
customer_reviews.author: Marian OSullivan

customer_reviews.title: This little camera is fun to have
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is fun to have, I love using it all the time and my collection is building up very quickly. It's easy and fun to use with different filters, boarder options and a time it couldn't be more exciting. The only flaws are the picture quality isn't as good as a regular camera and it doesn't come with instructions but other than that it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Allison

customer_reviews.title: Polaroid camera
customer_reviews.text: Works best in day time, but otherwise a fun way to store memories and perfect for pictures in your wallet or phone case.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: I advise anyone that's looking to buy this camera to ...
customer_reviews.text: I advise anyone that's looking to buy this camera to buy a bluetooth portable printer. The end result is the same, it's less expensive and you'll still get to keep your photos on your mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my 9 year old granddaughter and she loves it - enough said
customer_reviews.author: Alan Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Bad color tone and quality
customer_reviews.text: Pictures have a bad quality and all of color options have a pink tone.
customer_reviews.author: Maris

customer_reviews.title: Printer broken on receipt. Thought I was using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Printer broken on receipt. Thought I was using the wrong paper initially, however having tried all other types it appears that the printer is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Webber

customer_reviews.title: Over all a nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Really nice camera nice print quality but slow to print
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: Good: Looks great. It is easy to use. Well sized so you can carry it with you. Bad: Do not take pictures under poor light! The lense is not wide enough to fit a group of 6!! Poor instruction manual. The photo booth option is unrealistic considering how small is the paper. All in all it is a cool gadget but do not expect much from it. Great present idea though ;)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser884422

customer_reviews.title: Photos look terrible.
customer_reviews.text: NOPE!!!!! Terrible photo quality. And they fade from light after a few months. Took 2 photos and returned it. I much prefer my instax camera.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera. I always wanted a Polaroid camera when I was younger but my parents couldn't afford it this little gadget is great I've gone through loads of photo paper so far so that's on my Xmas list to stock up. Catches all the on the spot moments and you get a picture straight away
customer_reviews.author: rc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my girlfriend, she loves it! Only regret is that i should've bought one myself..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of photos
customer_reviews.text: The quality of photo is poor and much worse than the fugifilm camara that my friend has. I enailed the seller to complain and got a unhelpful reply. I have been left with poor, expensive product. I would return in a heartbeat-alongwith the photos if i could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: picture are very very bad quality and support doesn't reply to your mail
customer_reviews.text: picture are very very bad quality and support doesn't reply to your mail. The price doesn't reflect the real value of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gianluca Ameruoso

customer_reviews.title: Cheap &  rarely works
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the worst purchases I’ve ever made. I was so excited for this camera. I have now purchased the same camera twice and both of them have been absolute junk. Prints blank photos randomly jam I have now purchased the same camera twice and both of them have been absolute junk. Prints blank photos randomly (about 50% of the time) and jams up. The current jam has completely made this camera useless. The first camera I thought was a fluke but after buying the second one and having the same problems I realize it’s just a cheap novelty with a high-priced tag. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute camera. It is similar in size to my phone so I can carry it around with me. The pictures it takes are pretty good! Definitely not the highest quality digital camera, but I got this for the nostalgia feel and the instant photos. The camera acts more like a printer where the images come out fully developed compared to the slow develop of older instant photos. I love the fact that I can have a digital copy of the photos so I can give them away to friends. I've included photos so you can see the difference between the digital and the physical photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible purchase. The Fujifipm index is a far superior ...
customer_reviews.text: Before you buy this, don’t, just don’t, This is a terrible purchase. The Fujifipm index is a far superior camera and a much cheaper option. This camera is always glitching and every picture comes out with a Blue tent to it. Furthermore, the viewfinder does not work, which is the only way to see what you’re taking pictures of as it is not a digital camera, and every picture comes out with heads cut off or off center. Unfortunately, I received this camera as a Christmas gift and didn’t start really trying to use it until now for pictures of my son, but it is too late to return to Amazon. Do not make the same mistake that I did!
customer_reviews.author: Colton and Meg M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little instant camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little instant camera. For those reviewers complaining about the colors, it sounds like they aren't familiar with the type of photography this kind of camera is simulating. No, the pictures are not super-sharp, high-definition prints, but that's not what this camera is trying to be. Under the "standard" color setting, the photos come out looking like a film camera from the late 80s, where the "sepia" photos look like they were taken from my grandpa's camera from the 60s. The focus has been sharp and impressive at all distances I've shot. I'm very pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable piece of technology, even as a toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cool toy to give to my son in order to document our overseas trip...unfortunately the camera managed to take around 10 pictures before it stopped working. The printer portion of the camera started spitting out blank paper, then refusing to print altogether...overall pretty disappointed with purchase and would steer people away from this.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on this pos
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money on this pos. I had it for 2 days, took about 15 horribly exposed pictures, and then it decided to stop working entirely. I took a photo and the print light came on as usual, but nothing printed. I waited a few minutes and tried turning it off... i can't even turn the thing off. I trtied searching the web for support, zero support for this apparently very common issue. So here I am returning this disappointment. Hopefully this review helps paint a more practical picture of the pile of junk you recieve.
customer_reviews.author: davealley

customer_reviews.title: This camera is excellent!, one thing though
customer_reviews.text: This camera is excellent!, one thing though, the power button should be separate and recessed. The flip up eye piece also turns on the power. The spring loaded flip up is really easy to hit thus causing the camera to come on at an unwanted time. This in turn can run down the battery unknown to the user until they get ready to use it and discover that the battery is dead. Otherwise it's an excellent camera!
customer_reviews.author: JWilks

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: The photos are terrible--not only are they tiny, tiny (which I knew), I can't hardly tell what I took pictures of! They are all blurry and low quality. And the photo is not centered on what's centered in the viewfinder! I wasted several photos trying to get a pic of something but it kept getting well below where I had the viewfinder pointed--in some cases, what I was looking at in viewfinder isn't in the photo at all! It's also next to impossible to hold this thing without accidentally pressing one of the buttons, especially the stupid color mode button. The old Polaroid instant cameras were a million times better than this junk.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Passport photo picture size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my daughter's birthday. While she was very excited when she received it, the happiness was lost quite rapidly. The camera came with only 5 blank prints. The size of the pictures is so small, you can take passport picture size photos, or you will need a microscope to see anything. Finally, the overall quality of the camera is "inexpensive" (I am not saying cheap as it works and I do not think it would break - but it is definitely not good) and not worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: Mogadishu 207

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Use, But Color Quality is Poor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 8-year-old son as a birthday gift. He LOVES it! In a digital world, he gets no end of excitement taking pictures of friends and family and having an immediate keepsake. It's also incredibly easy to use, and he mastered all of the features in a day. Why only 3 stars? The image quality is quite poor. The promo materials make the colors of the photos look vivid, but the reality is that they're much more akin to what you'd expect from a 1970s Polaroid. Flat, with an off blue cast and questionable contrast. So - great for a kid, but adults may want to consider something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work only worked on Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked only once on Christmas it does not work at all I have a different one that my son bought me it worked great I don’t know how to contact the seller to see if they would fix it or exchange it it really is a total disappointment it was a gift and I feel terrible that she just told me this weekend that the camera only worked For One day it does not Print
customer_reviews.author: jmg

customer_reviews.title: This camera promises lots of fun. Loving it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera! It wasn't super easy to make it work but once you get it going it lots of fun. Few recommendations: Read the first couple of pages of the manual to set it up (easier than trying by yourself); lighting It's important and every retake consumes paper, so be aware of that; for vertical pictures with border (It's amazing that this is an option) to have the bigger space on top place the lens on your right side.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Fun Great Camera - Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Brand new camera. Battery dies after about 20 prints. Charged it overnight. Brought it to a party and after I think 18 picture prints (might have been 21) the battery died. I brought 50 sheets with me intending to use it as a photo booth. I am worried that in 6 months the battery will start approaching only 10 prints on a charge. Also, THESE ARE NOT POLAROID SIZE PRINTS. THEY ARE LITTLE PASSPORT SIZE PRINTS. Still lots of fun. Don’t buy this one. Buy the full size one for a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas R. - D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super neat unfortunately I put the paper in backwards the first two times I tried to use it so nothing happened.... Lol.... But when I did it correctly the picture actually came out rather amazing considering I took it in the dark... The detail is very good.... I just didn't give it a 5 star rating because I haven't seen any other prints since it was just a test run to make sure I didn't need to replace it or anything before Christmas.... But I have no doubt in my mind that it will likely make vibrant and colorful pictures when my son uses it all through Christmas day and afterward
customer_reviews.author: Spoiledpsycho13

customer_reviews.title: Dull faded pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the Fujifilm Instax and tine instax takes better pictures. So disappointed in Polaroid as it should be the best instant picture option. Perhaps the other Polaroid model is the better choice. my pictures were faded and dull when printed no matter the amount of light. The only thing I did like was the design of the camera. Easier to hold than the Fujifilm.
customer_reviews.author: gvsandrs

customer_reviews.title: Overall we are very pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are very pleased with this item. It was a birthday present for my little sister. She very much enjoyed taking the photos. Unfortunately there were no instructions that came with the item so you kind of figure it out as you go. Strangely even though the picture on the box looks as if you load the photo paper print forward its actually the opposite. Also be sure you are considering your lighting and angles in the view finder as it definitely effects the photos. This is not a modern digital camera with the display on the back its a click and see when it prints. Personally I think that builds more skill and makes better photos!
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past that's great for albums. It works!!
customer_reviews.text: It's so great, it's cheap and does what it says. The film is the most affordable too. However it has no flash. This is a buy for people who care more about just instagram. IT NEEDS LIGHT ON WHAT YOU"RE TAKING A PICTURE OF. I had quite a few pictures turn out too dark to see. At dusk this won't really work well. I wish I could buy a cheap flash to go with. Oh well I guess that was too much to ask on to a $100 camera. Great for parties!! The tangible feeling of having a photo is so much more significant that when its just on your phone. Its special for the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: Korbin in Dallass

customer_reviews.title: Very.disappointed with this purchase, this product and this company
customer_reviews.text: A birthday gift for my grand daughter. She opened the package and there absolutely were no instructions. No information on how to load the paper (up or down). No information on the calibration process, no website for manual download on the package. We spend over half an hour of frustrating attempts to get it working with no success. This was an expensive gift to have this unacceptable customer experience. I do not recommend giving this product consideration.
customer_reviews.author: tennis_nut-7

customer_reviews.title: Thing of the past.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted one of these. My family had one many many years ago however there is a lot of difference between now and then. When she got it her mother spent about a $100 in film as a 9 year old will take pictures of anything just to see the picture come out. Now it is in her room laying with many other toys that were so great in the beginning but now has fallen by the wayside. I would recommend buying a good $40 digital camera and developing any quality pictures that you want to keep at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the shot
customer_reviews.text: Although this should be fun, it is not super easy to figure out. It didnt come with printed instructions, I had to google them. We were on a safari and thought it would be fun foe the kiddo to use. It is a nice little camera, altho prints take a little bit, the quality is as expected, you need practice with how to use it requiring more sheets for printing and bonus.... you have to charge it often. Print a few times...charge... not worth what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: KDA

customer_reviews.title: Barely Passable, Beware Fake Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Cute camera body but the pictures are pretty low quality. Even after fiddling with the settings there's a weird bluish tint to them that made me think I received a defective unit. The alignment is also a touch off. I would not re-purchase. I also feel duped by the number of fake reviews on this listing. Countless 5-star reviews keyword stuffing the phrase "instant print camera". Whole listing should be removed for this kind of abuse. Please report them.
customer_reviews.author: reviews of the fooot

customer_reviews.title: The concept of the camera is great however the quality of the camera is not
customer_reviews.text: The concept of the camera is great however the quality of the camera is not. I was very excited to receive the camera more so was super happy about how fast I got it. However the pictures print out bad. Evwry last one of the pictures came out blurry and I felt like it was a waste of my money more so there is no focus on this camera and forget about adjustment functions. I will be contacting amazon about this.
customer_reviews.author: Naja Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Do. Not. Buy. This.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter. Worked great for the 1st 8 pictures. Now? The film doesn't even come out. Called Polaroid for support, tried all the trouble shooting tips & still nothing. Had it less than 4 months when it did that. Complete waste of $90.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingfan

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ITEM: Starter pack
customer_reviews.text: Well, since this item was a Christmas gift for my daughter, of course I didn't OPEN IT to check the contents when it arrived. To my dismay, when my daughter opened on Christmas, it was MISSING the starter pack of 5 pages photo paper that was listed as "included" in the item's description!! Now, I know it was supposed to be in there because I bought my son the exact same camera and his had the 5-pages starter pack of photo paper in it! Smart me, I had separately bought each of them a 50-count pack of the photo paper. but still. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Alys Caviness

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning it sounded like a great idea but after getting the camera and trying to use it for a few days I realized how terrible it is. The picture quality looks like a 2003 Nokia Half the time you take a picture and it prints nothing. Even if you have the printing paper full and battery charged. The other half when I’d finally decides to take the picture it completely off center. I would not recommend anyone wasting their time on this.
customer_reviews.author: christopher harper

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It came with less than 6 paper photo and no manual instructions. However is very easy to use. Giftable is depending since the paper photo are expensive, so it may not be budget wise. You can print one picture or 4 different on one single paper photo which is a nice feature. The picture can be printed in black and white. Overall is a good product but expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: selling used items as new?
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't say how well this camera works because: 1 The printing paper package was empty 2, No instruction booklet 3, No camera strap I'm going to avoid buying electronics etc from Amazon as I don't like that this package was probably resold to me. Does the camera work? Maybe not I had to buy film to try it. I'm sorry I bought it from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Deanna K

customer_reviews.title: Love it but......
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I do not love spending a fortune on film. To get the right pic sometimes takes 4 or 5 attempts. I sold this and bought the touch screen one, you can see it before you choose to print it or not. I got this one first because Of nostalgia, I liked the idea of not knowing what was coming out. I recommend spending the bit extra to save in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Buildingblessings

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use, lasting pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I use it whenever there is a family gathering and people love to take home a hard copy for themselves. Printed pictures are really appreciated more than a phone shot and are perfect for refrigerator magnets and bulletin boards. Be sure to access the instruction manual on the website. Carefully load the paper, charge the battery, and it should work great.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. Allred

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed. Cheap. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Gifted for Christmas- I was so disappointed. I watched as the giftee struggled with loading the film, and then taking a picture that was grainy and dark. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fina

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but refills are pricey
customer_reviews.text: Fun camera though I think it should have some paper instructions with it that are more in depth for a first time user. It does have a website you can go on but not too helpful really , as one still haves questions about this that remain left to figure out in my opinion. Once we did figure it out we loved this little camera for daughter. Refills are pricey , so that would be the only downfall or reconsideration one would prob have as far as the purchase of the cam. It does motivate daughter to ask for jobs to do around the house to earn money for refills though.
customer_reviews.author: Fosti

customer_reviews.title: It takes okay polaroids.
customer_reviews.text: obviously Polaroids aren't the best pictures but they have their own character. This camera is easy to use but the pictures don't reproduce enough light. As in the pictures are very white washed. I also dont care much for the magnetic lens cap as I imagine it will get lost quickly since the magnets are not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Erik B.

customer_reviews.title: I also didnt like the placement of the shutter button either
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because there were streaks in every single print. Every print had bluish streaks! It wasnt the film, because i snapped a few diff packages. I tried different lighting...nothing improved it. I also didnt like the placement of the shutter button either...i seemed to accidentally change the shooting modes while taking pictures so then they would come out black and white or such. Poor design on that. Didnt like the magnetic lens cover... too easy to lose it since its not attached! I did like the zink film though...so decided to order the polaroid zip printer and its way better than the camera! Too bad...i wanted to like this camera but too many flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fun, just to save time you should know that the color spectrum circle is on the top left, you turn on by lifting the middle square viewing frame, and take pictures by pressing the red button once. Load film by opening back up, put green code paper face down first then the white film next, glossy side down. Press the red button to take your first picture then wait til the green code paper comes out. When it is done the picture will come out next.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Jae

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, easy to use. Refills expensive.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves this. So cute all the memories she’s capturing. Pictures are good for what they are. They aren’t going to be iPhone or professional camera quality. But for kids or scrap booking, they’re pretty good. The refills are expensive though. $25 for 50 photos is a lot when Walmart prints photos at .20 a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Joci McCann

customer_reviews.title: Great instant camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this little Polaroid camera! I read a lot of reviews before purchasing this. You have to take it for what it is, you aren't going to have amazing picture quality in an instant print, it's the instant satisfaction and nostalgia you're buying. This being said, the picture quality is just fine with me. I've yet to use the digital option (with mini SD card) but I'm excited to explore that option as well.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good quality prints. Comes with a small number of papers so it is advisable to buy a pack of paper along with the camera. Can take black and white or color prints. Prints within seconds. This was a birthday gift for my 10 year old daughter and arrived on time, undamaged and in brand new packaging.
customer_reviews.author: LB2309Z

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit with my Grandson!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old grandson is going to be a big brother in June, so his very own camera seemed like a timely and appropriate gift. His parents got it set up for him, and he enjoyed taking his own pictures at Easter. The quality of the photos is quite good, and I think this is a gift he will enjoy for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to pay a lot for the photo paper.
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to play with. The photos are very small but they are stickers so that's kind of fun. The camera takes decent photos in well lit places. The biggest downfall is how pricey the photo paper is. So you dont get the luxury of taking random photos without a little preparedness cuz who wants to waste photo paper on bad pics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not do well in heat.
customer_reviews.text: My plan was to take photos of livestock costume contestants at the fair and attach to a plaque. Although the camera was in the shade it overheated after 5 photos and wouldn't work. It was really disappointing. They didn't even transfer onto the micro disc. 2 weeks later and the pictures come out fuzzy. There were no warnings to not use the camera when the temperature is hot. Is there anyway I can return the camera for a refund or another camera?
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: The Micro SD has to be FAT32!
customer_reviews.text: The micro SD card has to be formatted using FAT32. The manual says the max size is 32GB, but you can use a larger card as long as you format it to FAT32. Win10 won't let you use FAT32 on disks larger than 32GB, so you may need to get creative. Decent instant camera for the price, though the colors come out pale.
customer_reviews.author: DXLi

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: we used this camera at a wedding thinking it would be easy....it is unrelaible and the cost is not worth it at all! More than 75% of the time my staff couldn't use it! We tried again at another event same thing! JUNK! Only thing I would reccommend on this camera is a full refund the intue you buy it! Waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: nicole cyr

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but could have been simpler to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute concept, but I think it tries to do too much. I found myself triggering the burst modes by accident, and ditto for the black and white vs. color mode. Call it user error if you'd like, but if I wanted a more sophisticated camera, I wouldn't be shooting on polaroid film. For a retro throwback item, I would have preferred a simple point and shoot format with less frills. However, the inclusion of an sd card slot was a thoughtful addition, although I doubt I'll end up using it.
customer_reviews.author: Zampcaster

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic first camera for children of all ages
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this camera. After much research and comparison with the other top brand starting with the letter F. I found that for the money this camera has more features. The photos have a peel off back that lets them be used as stickers! ( who doesn't love stickers?) and if you run out of film you can insert a memory card to capture photos digitally. Some improvements going forward would be a larger battery and an actual functioning viewfinder as in my experience the included one is just for looks.
customer_reviews.author: clark2298

customer_reviews.title: very pixelated....
customer_reviews.text: not recommended everything is fine but the quality of the photos its extremely pixelated and that makes it hard to see details like eyes facial features etc. and sometimes theres a little line that pops up right across the middle of the picture and can really ruin the photo it's hard to explain without a picture of it, it is really portable though its a cute small camera for kids and it gives you pictures but if you want quality photos this is not the camera trust me
customer_reviews.author: Malvern Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: -It's nice to have pictures instantly printed
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -It's nice to have pictures instantly printed. -It's compact and looks nice. Cons: -The viewfinder doesn't work very well, or I, at least, can't seem to take straight pictures with it. I am constantly cutting half of my daughters body out of the picture when I use it. If I want to take centered pictures I have to angle the camera without using the viewfinder and guess if it is centered or not. -Picture quality isn't that great indoors; I have not used it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Family

customer_reviews.title: Picture color isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: I do love this camera, I got the red and it’s adorable, but I wish they could fix a couple things! First it drives me nuts the camera doesn’t come with instructions, you have to look them up on your own. The pictures are very clear but even with the normal settings I don’t love the color of the pictures. Besides that, I really do like the camera!
customer_reviews.author: TiffB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to capture pictures for a milestone birthday party. How disappointing... the camera just stopped working after taking only 3 pictures. The quality of the pictures I did get to print from the camera were not clear. They were distorted and had a weird tint to them. What a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Horrible picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera because the film is affordable compared to other Polaroid cameras. The quality of the pictures was absolutely horrible. We tried each color mode in dark and in bright situations and the quality is down right poor. I couldn’t believe it. Immediately returned this product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NUNYA

customer_reviews.title: Pictured backwards on amazon BUT great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This picture is flipped/backwards. I thought it was a camera for left handed people. Meaning the button was on the left side. My 8 yr old daughter has hemiplegic Cerebral Palsy and has extreme weakness in her right hand. So i was excited when I found this but kind of disappointed when it arrived. HOWEVER its a great little camera! Vibrant color! Pictures look awesome! Its easy for me to use but not so much for my daughter to use independently. But overall happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Camera Is Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Camera does not work correctly. Bought this for my daughter for Christmas, and it will not turn off when it is supposed to. The camera stays on the entire time until the battery dies. Now it will also not respond to the color selection that we want by pressing that button as well. The camera we received is JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for school. I find the pictures work nicely on flash cards. I don't have flash issues as I hold one finger over the flash when I take the picture. Works well and I get the picture I need! So far I've been defending my 4.0 GPA, so this study technique must be working!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mattos

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and we were planning on taking fun Christmas and New Year photos
customer_reviews.text: The camera I purchased was a defect. I purchased it as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and we were planning on taking fun Christmas and New Year photos. Unfortunately, the camera couldn't stay charged for more than a minute so we only got one picture out of it. I contacted Amazon and they allowed me to do a refund pretty easily. I purchased the same camera (but in white) at Target to ensure ease of return ability and that one works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Kitkate

customer_reviews.title: not as easy as the original
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for the price. It doesn't last terribly long with continuous use. The power button is too easy to hit as well as the other buttons on the top. If you use it continuously it will heat up and start causing artifacts on the paper. Loading paper is a pain, especially when it has to print the blue card. Sticky backs to paper is awesome it was used for a guest book at two weddings. You do need someone who can operate it doing it for the guests because it isn't intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peek

customer_reviews.title: Can't Wait to Use in the Spring!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to use this particular camera model, and am glad I bought it! Offers a wide variety of settings, so the same old photo can't be taken, regardless of subject! Can't wait until warmer weather to try it outside!
customer_reviews.author: Kate London

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre yet nostalgic picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend as a gift. We like to go on short trips and take photos and she likes to scrap book. The picture quality isn’t the best but we kind of like the charm of it anyway. Because the film it prints out doubles as a sticker, it works great for her needs. Would definitely recommend if you’re willing to sacrifice picture quality for fun instant memories.
customer_reviews.author: jseffendi

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I got bamboozled. The camera does not work. I read the manual on Polaroid's website, but nothing. I bought the correct paper and batteries and card, still nothing. I had a bad feeling having to buy through a third party, but I went ahead and did it anyways. Polaroid does not sell this camera from their website; they just direct you to buy through third party sellers on Amazon... hmmm. I should have gone with my gut feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen N

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, super excited to take to Disney
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used, and when I got it, it wouldn't print. I do like the features it has so once I get one that works I know I will love it. I got this to take to Disney World so that when we get character signatures we can instantly stick them in a mini photo album instead of doing digital and having to order prints afterwards. It will be awesome for my son to get to experience polaroid like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Lili H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because i love polaroid products and wanted the same kind of "snao and print" function the older versions exhibited but with a modern touch. This camera definitely does NOT disappoint. I absolutely love it! I would like to add thag if you are in fluorescent lighting (inside a house/building/etc) that you should use the flash or the pictures will come out very "fuzzy". But other than thay i LOVE this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Marie

customer_reviews.title: There’s better polaroid cameras than this.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures come out very pixilated. Very disappointed. Could’ve bought the insta mini for the same price and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to start a photo album with my significant other as an anniversary gift. I was so excited to create memories in an instant, but when I took photos I noticed the quality was poor. I took several more thinking it was the paper or the camera was not calibrated properly. Turned out that was not true. After digging more online with product review and specs from professionals I found out that it is the camera. I was not happy and it ruined my wonderful night. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cute, easy to use ... no instructions included though
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera love all the different fractures it comes with that’s why I bought it , the only thing I wasn’t happy about was that it didn’t come with instructions on how to work it I had to figure it out which means wasting film that I had to pay separately for just to see how pictures turned out but everything else was great
customer_reviews.author: AriesQueen25

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of this camera. We bought it for our wedding day so guests could take pics of themselves and add to our guest book, but the pictures were all off center, it mostly cut the top part of the picture which was mostly peoples heads. The picture quality wasn’t that great either.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Baciu

customer_reviews.title: The pictures that it prints are crap....look worse than the polaroid cameras from the 80s.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures that it prints are crap....look worse than the polaroid cameras from the 80s. The pictures are blurry, the colors are way wrong, and pictures are often over exposed - even inside shots with no flash. Paper is installed correctly and the camera is fully charged. The replacement camera produced the same trash.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Ninja

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: An easy to use camera. After shooting a picture I had to be patient and wait for the photo to emerge (I did not hear the camera processing the photo because I am slightly hard of hearing). The pictures are great and ready to post in a scrap book, diary or greeting card ! A really great idea !
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good idea bad model.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if mine is broken, But. My pictures come out pretty blue, and comparing this to the fuji film counter that one blows this out of the water. The only difference this one is way more pretty compared to fuji films behemoth.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Durocher

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: This camera is junk. It stopped working about 3 weeks after we got it. It forces every photo that a kid takes to print, there is no option to not print the photo, so the paper gets wasted immediately. Not good, not for kids!
customer_reviews.author: A. General

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my most favorites things I own! I love this camera. I love how cute the pictures are and they are adhesive which is perfect for scrapbooking. So super cute. I also got the case to protect it when I travel. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I think the quality of the Fiji is probably better. The Fiji film also has a white space ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because it was more compact than the popular Fiji one but there are some differences. I think the quality of the Fiji is probably better. The Fiji film also has a white space (like the original Polaroids) to write on and the Polaroid film that I've found so far does not.
customer_reviews.author: brPRIME

customer_reviews.title: Easy Fun Photos
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun taking photos. They are small enough to fit in your wallet! The grandchildren love them. The camera has three settings, color, black and white and the brownish old style look. It's easy to charge up after whenever you're done with taking photos. You just plug it into your computer. The cord comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Help

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes the worst pictures.  I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandson for his 14th birthday party. He was taking pictures of all the friends at the party. The quality and color was terrible. Very unhappy with purchase. Wish I had returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and great for keeping memories
customer_reviews.text: I love how portable this camera is, the quality is a little blochy rather than being crisp as can be when printed onto film. The camera is heavily sensitive to light, with too much or too little. I think a great thing about this camera is that if you keep the lens protection cap on and take a picture it won’t actually print, same with if something is out of focus. So you don’t end up waisting film that is about 50 cents each. Definitely a great gift to catch memories in a moment that can be held or out anywhere for a physical item!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gannon

customer_reviews.title: I have difficulties with getting the pictures to print... You ...
customer_reviews.text: I have difficulties with getting the pictures to print... You can hear the roller rolling but no picture comes out I fidget with it and can get it to work, but I'm not really impressed with the product itself especially since there's no instructions and I had to go online just to see how it was supposed to function and still had to manipulate the product from there
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: 6 out of every 10 picture would NOT come out clear. Had to be care with how you would hold the camera. The button that changes the settings from color to black and white was right where you would normally hold any camera. The battery do not hold charge for long. Low quality camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Caraballo

customer_reviews.title: Best camera out there
customer_reviews.text: I love taking Polaroids - this is easily the best brand out there.
customer_reviews.author: maddy

customer_reviews.title: Thanks boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got me this instant printer for my birthday and I was like Yas queen! He really is the best and I'm so happy to have him in my life I can't even tell you. So I tried it out and of course I'm loving it. I'll have to get mmy hair done and take some photots with it to show the girls, they are gonna be so jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Leona

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is terrible. I understand smartphone cameras are great and the expectations are high. But even for my 7 year old to take pics, these are really bad. I wouldn’t recommend this camera even if it’s just for your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge472

product_meta.title: Zink Polaroid Snap Instant Digital Camera (Blue) with ZINK Zero Ink Printing Technology
product_meta.description:
Nostalgic Polaroid instant photography in a modern
package


Polaroid Snap is the brand’s newest addition to its expanding
instant digital camera line, delivering signature Polaroid
instant simplicity and spontaneity in a pocket-sized form In
addition to its compact footprint and classic Polaroid instant
camera experience, it combines digital imaging with Zero Ink
printing. This enables you to easily print and share physical
photos at the push of a button, while saving all your images for
easy uploading.


Striking Minimalist Design


True to the rest of the brand’s modern line, the Polaroid Snap
camera's minimalist design features an updated look that
incorporates a number of design elements of legacy Polaroid
instant cameras, such as the iconic Polaroid Color Spectrum.


Pocket-Friendly


It fits into your shirt pocket – and budget. Despite its many
digital technological advancements, the Polaroid Snap is an
easy-to-use and an accessible-to-all product at a price point you
would expect to pay for an instant camera.


10MP and Up to 32GB


Instantly share your life with loved ones in vivid color with
features such as a 10MP sensor, a micro SD card slot (32GB max),
various capture modes and photo booth mode, Polaroid Classic
Border Logo printing format, and an instant selfie self-timer.


ZINK Zero Ink Printing


The integrated ZINK printer enables you to instantly print
full-color, smudge-proof 2x3” prints automatically when an image
is captured – without ink cartridges, or toners. You can even
shoot new images while its printing.


Post Anywhere


The 2x3” prints are ready in under a minute, and their adhesive
backing makes for extra fun and easy posting on most surfaces.
Your photos are also saved on the Snap for easy uploading to your
computer and social media platforms.
feature_bullets: SNAP, PRINT, SHARE - The Polaroid Snap instant digital camera captures all the fun and spontaneity of the legacy Polaroid instant camera in an easy, compact package. Simply point and click to print vibrant, high-quality photos that you can share, no computer connections needed

ZERO INK, ZERO TONER, INSTANT RESULTS - The integrated ZINK printing technology enables you to instantly print full-color, smudge-proof 2x3 inches prints automatically when an image is captured - without ink, ribbons or toner cartridges, this enables you to easily print and share physical photos at the push of a button, while saving all your images for easy uploading

EMBRACE YOUR INNER PHOTOGRAPHER - Get snapping, capture details with the powerful 10 megapixel sensor, insert a microSD card (32GB max) to expand the memory, load your Zink paper and print on the spot, add an artistic touch with the different picture modes available. Simile to the camera and take a selfie with the built-in selfie mirror or get yourself and the group in the shot with the self-timer feature

POST ANYWHERE - The 2X3" prints are ready in under a minute, the adhesive backing makes for extra fun and easy posting on most surfaces. Your photos are also saved on the Polaroid Snap for easy uploading to your computer and social media platforms

CHARMING DESIGN – Comes in Variety of Fun, Bold Colors; Compact, slips neatly into your shirt pocket. Includes a Wrist Strap, Micro USB Cord. Only POLAROID products offered by authorized dealers are covered by its manufacturers warranty. A list of authorized distributors is on the manufactures website

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars796 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
